sections.title: Technology Inventory Survey
sections.subtitle: Help us understand your project's technology stack
sections.body:
This survey collects information about your project in 3 stages:

1. Project Overview: Basic project information
2. Technology Stack: Languages, hosting and infrastructure
3. Tools & Collaboration: Development and communication tools

After completing the main survey, you'll have the option to provide feedback.

sections.title: Sign In
sections.subtitle: Access your saved progress
sections.body: Sign in to continue where you left off or start a new survey.

sections.title: Technology Inventory Complete!
sections.subtitle: Thank you for your responses
sections.body:
Your project information has been saved.

Would you like to provide feedback on your survey experience? This is optional and helps us improve.

sections.title: All Done!
sections.subtitle: Thank you for completing the survey
sections.body: Your responses have been recorded and will help us better understand the technology landscape across projects.

sections.title: Signed Out
sections.subtitle: You have been successfully signed out
sections.body: Thank you for completing the Technology Inventory Survey. Your session has ended and your progress has been saved.
